summary: Avenging vampire stalks a king of the vampires in Eastern Europe, slaughters anyone who gets in his way.
cast: Jonathon Morris|David Gunn|Kirsten Cerre|Starr Andreeff|Ilinca Goia|Constantin Barbulescu|Mihai Dinvale|Dan Condurache|Mihai Niculescu|Petre Moraru|Rodica Lupu|Floriela Grappini|Diana Lupan|Maria Dimitrache-Caraman|Elvira Deatcu|Liliana Popovici|Alice Balaianu|Crina Matei|Cristina Oancea|Lucia Burcovischi|Oana Florea|Cosmin Sofron|Alexandru Itcus|Florin Irimia|Constantin Draganescu|Florinel Piersic|Cristian Motiu|Bogdan Voda|Liviu Craciun|Mihaela Mihai|Antonella Zaharia|Freddy Onofrei|Gabi Andronache|Tatiana Sorbala|Mihaela Bilisica|Anca Marcu|Luminita Pusca|Michael Denish|Gelu Nitu
title: Vampire Journals
